Text.val: 08.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901

ExpSyntax.val: VarMod ('{0,1}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,2}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,8}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,14}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,15}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,16}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,17}'VAR)

Text.val: If V.CODE = 1 then set DSCD_SORTCODE = 20000 + 5000 + V.DDAYS
If V.CODE = 2 then set DSCD_SORTCODE = 10000 + 5000 - V.DDAYS
If V.CODE = 3 then set DSCD_SORTCODE = 30000 + 5000 + V.DDAYS
If V.CODE = 4 then set DSCD_SORTCODE = 40000 + 5000 + V.DDAYS
